title: Figma Work
description: Designed a clean, modern UI/UX prototype using Figma that focuses on intuitive navigation and visual clarity. The layout demonstrates a strong understanding of user-centered design principles and seamless interaction flows.

title: Jewellery That Speaks Elegance
description: Full brand identity creation for a fictional luxury jewellery brand. Includes logo concepts, typography selection, color palette development, and brand style guide documentation.

title: EcoWear E-Commerce UI/UX
description: Designed the responsive visual interface and user experience flow for a sustainable clothing e-commerce platform. Focused on clear hierarchy and accessibility in product listings.

title: Car rental
description: Complete mobile UI/UX design for a local car rental service. Included wireframing, high-fidelity mockups, and interactive prototyping in Figma.

title: Brochure
description: Designed a tri-fold marketing brochure and corresponding digital PDF for a new tech startup. Managed layout, imagery, and ensured print-ready production specifications.

title: Reel
description: Created a series of five short-form animated video reels for Instagram and TikTok focused on product promotion, utilizing After Effects and Adobe Illustrator.

title: FestivalÂ post
description: Designed a vertical, animated social media video (Reel/Story format) celebrating the victory of good. Utilized Kinetic Typography and a bold, metallic color palette (deep red/gold) to create a sense of motion and impact. Focus was on a quick, high-energy message.

title: Onine Home Service System
description: This system is providing the online service at home. This system provides all kind of service that you need to your home. An online home service system is a digital platform that facilitates the booking and management of various home-related services through an easy-to-use website or mobile app.

title: Smart Temperature Control System For Home
description: The Smart Temperature Control System for Home is an IoT-based solution designed to monitor and regulate indoor temperature conditions in real time. The system automatically detects temperature variations and triggers appropriate actions such as activating a fan, air conditioner, or heater to maintain a comfortable environment. It also provides instant user notifications through an LCD display, LED indicators, and a buzzer.
